item.title: Fred Hickey of the High Tech Strategist says AI bubble is starting to pop, buys puts on Nvidia
item.description: The long-time technology analyst has begun seeing evidence of the AI trade unwinding.

item.title: The ‘AI to kill software’ narrative is wrecking the group. But Bank of America says buy this stock in the sell-off
item.description: Bank of America believes that investors are unfairly pricing in a growth shock for SAP that is unlikely to occur.

item.title: Software stock rout shocks Street: 'Nowhere to hide'... 'Morass of gloom'
item.description: Tuesday's tech pullback has investors worrying the negative sentiment in the sector could persist for some time.

item.title: Bank of America double upgrades Five Below, sees more upside under new leadership
item.description: Bank of America's price target of $233, hiked from $158, implies upside of 18%.

item.title: Wall Street is concerned about AMD's profitability despite its high spending. Here's a roundup of worries
item.description: Wall Street analysts remain largely neutral on Advanced Micro Devices going forward.
